name: VROOM (ALPHA) (Desaw)
description:
VROOM is a fun, fast-paced, acrade styled racing game.

Featuring drifting , fun cars, a simple but appealing low-poly artstyle and lots more! 

This game is still in active development, and this is a Alpha Version for the final game. The final game will include much more content, polish and bugfixes. If you want to follow development of the game, then join my Discord Server for updates and sneakpeeks.

There are probably bugs and lots of small issues in the game right now, its really helpful if you report them in the comments, but please keep in mind that its still in active development and there will be bugs. 

Controls

You can control your car with a Keyboard or a Gamepad.

Basics
  • Move - WASD / Shoulder triggers and Left Joysticks
  • Brake - Space  / A (X-Box) / X (Playstation)
UI
  • Pause Menu - TAB 
Others
  • Switch Cars - 1, 2, 3, 4  (Keyboard)
  • Reset - R (Keyboard) / Y (X-Box) / Triangle (Playstation)
Game Tips
  • The off-road parts (brown) make some cars slower.
  • If you are drifting, compensate by turning in the other direction.
  • Every car has its own advantages and disadvantages.
    • Basic Car: Good allarounder
    • Drifting Car: Good at drifting, Not that fast
    • Racing Car: Very fast, Slow in offroad, Can't drift that esay
    • ???:  Mhm..

If you like the music in my game, definitely check M4-Beats, he is the guy who did the great music.

Anyways, have fun :)
